pkgmetadata.longdescription: Latent Unknown Clustering with Integrated Data // An implementation of LUCID model (Peng (2019) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btz667). LUCID conducts integrated clustering using exposures, omics data (and outcome of interest). An EM algorithm is implemented to estimate MLE of LUCID model. LUCID features integrated variable selection, incorporation of missing omics data, bootstrap inference and visualization via Sankey diagram.
